name: College Humor and Dorkly 2016 Wide & Trimmed
description: Trim the fat from College Humor and Dorkly. Remove ads and social media nags. Widened article views.
css:
@-moz-document domain("collegehumor.com"), domain("dorkly.com"){

/* Hide Ads */

.adContainer,
#ad-dynamic-header,
.pushcrew-side-button,
#sidebar,
#ad-banner,
#banner_footer,
.bannerAd,
.footer_inner,
#billboardAd,
.boxAd,
.ad-pushdown,
.pod-ad,
.top-banner,
#top-banner,
#skin-banner,
#skin-banner.top-banner,
#like-box,
.share-bar,
.recommended-video,
.related-links,
.ad,
.sticky-ad-mobile,
#adscroll_160x600,
#fsk_splitbox_1677_onscreen,
div[id*='adscroll'],
div[id*='ad-scroll'],
div[id*='footerboxad'],
div[class*='adscroll'],
div[class*='ad-scroll'],
div[class*='footerboxad'],
div[style*="vector-effect: none; paint-order: fill;"],
div[style*="animation: none 0s ease 0s 1 normal none running;"]
{
    display: none !important;
}

div.container.container-main:nth-of-type(00),
div.container.container-main:nth-of-type(01),
div.container.container-main:nth-of-type(02),
div.container.container-main:nth-of-type(03),
div.container.container-main:nth-of-type(04),
div.container.container-main:nth-of-type(05),
div.container.container-main:nth-of-type(06),
div.container.container-main:nth-of-type(07),
div.container.container-main:nth-of-type(08),
div.container.container-main:nth-of-type(09),
div.container.container-main:nth-of-type(10),
div.container.container-main:nth-of-type(11),
div.container.container-main:nth-of-type(12),
div.container.container-main:nth-of-type(13),
div.container.container-main:nth-of-type(14),
div.container.container-main:nth-of-type(15),
div.container.container-main:nth-of-type(16),
div.container.container-main:nth-of-type(17),
div.container.container-main:nth-of-type(18),
div.container.container-main:nth-of-type(19),
div.container.container-main:nth-of-type(20),
div.container.container-main:nth-of-type(21),
div.container.container-main:nth-of-type(22),

div.container.container-main:nth-of-type(25),
div.container.container-main:nth-of-type(26),
div.container.container-main:nth-of-type(27),
div.container.container-main:nth-of-type(28),
div.container.container-main:nth-of-type(29),
div.container.container-main:nth-of-type(30),
div.container.container-main:nth-of-type(31),
div.container.container-main:nth-of-type(32),
div.container.container-main:nth-of-type(33),
div.container.container-main:nth-of-type(34),
div.container.container-main:nth-of-type(35),
div.container.container-main:nth-of-type(36),
div.container.container-main:nth-of-type(37),
div.container.container-main:nth-of-type(38),
div.container.container-main:nth-of-type(39),
div.container.container-main:nth-of-type(40),
div.container.container-main:nth-of-type(41),
div.container.container-main:nth-of-type(42),
div.container.container-main:nth-of-type(43),
div.container.container-main:nth-of-type(44),
div.container.container-main:nth-of-type(45),
div.container.container-main:nth-of-type(46),
div.container.container-main:nth-of-type(47),
div.container.container-main:nth-of-type(48),
div.container.container-main:nth-of-type(49),
div.container.container-main:nth-of-type(50),
div.container.container-main:nth-of-type(51),
div.container.container-main:nth-of-type(52),
div.container.container-main:nth-of-type(53),
div.container.container-main:nth-of-type(54),
div.container.container-main:nth-of-type(55),
div.container.container-main:nth-of-type(56),
div.container.container-main:nth-of-type(57),
div.container.container-main:nth-of-type(58),
div.container.container-main:nth-of-type(59),
div.container.container-main:nth-of-type(60),
div.container.container-main:nth-of-type(61),
div.container.container-main:nth-of-type(62),
div.container.container-main:nth-of-type(63),
div.container.container-main:nth-of-type(64),
div.container.container-main:nth-of-type(65),
div.container.container-main:nth-of-type(66),
div.container.container-main:nth-of-type(67),
div.container.container-main:nth-of-type(68),
div.container.container-main:nth-of-type(69),
div.container.container-main:nth-of-type(70),
div.container.container-main:nth-of-type(71),
div.container.container-main:nth-of-type(72),
div.container.container-main:nth-of-type(73),
div.container.container-main:nth-of-type(74),
div.container.container-main:nth-of-type(75),
div.container.container-main:nth-of-type(76),
div.container.container-main:nth-of-type(77),
div.container.container-main:nth-of-type(78),
div.container.container-main:nth-of-type(79),
div.container.container-main:nth-of-type(80),
div.container.container-main:nth-of-type(81),
div.container.container-main:nth-of-type(82),
div.container.container-main:nth-of-type(83),
div.container.container-main:nth-of-type(84),
div.container.container-main:nth-of-type(85),
div.container.container-main:nth-of-type(86),
div.container.container-main:nth-of-type(87),
div.container.container-main:nth-of-type(88),
div.container.container-main:nth-of-type(89),
div.container.container-main:nth-of-type(90),
div.container.container-main:nth-of-type(91),
div.container.container-main:nth-of-type(92),
div.container.container-main:nth-of-type(93),
div.container.container-main:nth-of-type(94),
div.container.container-main:nth-of-type(95),
div.container.container-main:nth-of-type(96),
div.container.container-main:nth-of-type(97),
div.container.container-main:nth-of-type(98),
div.container.container-main:nth-of-type(99),
div.container.container-main:nth-of-type(100),
div.container.container-main:nth-of-type(101),
div.container.container-main:nth-of-type(102),
.SZbkknhmbe
{
    z-index: -999;
    background: none !important;
}

#skin-banner.top-banner
{
    margin-top: 0px !important;
}
/* Disable Background Ad Click Events */

body.ch.has-skin,
body.ch
{
    background: #eee url('http://www.collegehumor.com/images/bg-collegehumor-default.gif') no-repeat center top !important;
}

body.dorkly.has-skin,
body.dorkly
{
    background: #fff url('http://www.dorkly.com/images/bg-dorkly-default.png') repeat-x !important;
}

body.has-skin
{
    cursor: inherit !important;
    pointer-events: none;
}

body.has-skin div
{
    pointer-events: auto !important;
}
/* Full Width Articles */

@media (min-width: 1024px)
{
    .listing .to-affix
{
        float: none !important;
        width: 100% !important;
    }
    .row > div:nth-of-type(odd),
    .row > div:nth-of-type(odd) + .hide ~ div:nth-of-type(even)
{
        margin-right: 0px !important;
    }

    .listing:not(.custom-header):not(.listing-user) .content
{
        margin: 0px auto 0;
    }
}

@media (min-width: 992px)
{
    .col-md-8, .two-columns.item .primary
{
        max-width: none;
        width: 96% !important;
    }
    .row .col-md-8
{
        width: 66.66666666666666% !important;
    }
}

.post-content img
{
    display: block !important;
    margin: auto !important;
}

#player div
{
    margin: auto !important;
    max-width: 100% !important
}
}
